examples.korean: I am so hangry now: let's go out and take a bite of something. 발음듣기 나 지금 너무 배고파서 화가 나, 우리 나가서 뭐 좀 간단히 먹자. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: I am so hangry now: let's go out and take a bite of something. 발음

examples.korean: You cannot work on an empty stomach. 발음듣기 배고파서는 일을 할 수 없지 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You cannot work on an empty stomach. 발음

examples.korean: They had a meal because they were so hungry. 발음듣기 그들은 너무 배고파서 식사했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They had a meal because they were so hungry. 발음

examples.korean: I was nearly starving to death. Now that I had something to eat, I feel much better. 발음듣기 배고파서 죽을 뻔했는데 뭐를 좀 먹었더니 이제 살 것 같다 Neungyule
examples.english: I was nearly starving to death. Now that I had something to eat, I feel much better. 발음

examples.korean: I got hungry while waiting, so I ate first. 발음듣기 기다리다 배고파서 먼저 먹었어. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I got hungry while waiting, so I ate first. 발음
